name: KAN-DREADED
description: This is a simple WhatsApp bot built with Node.js and Baileys with MD support.

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for DREADED. To prevent errors and confusion, you must set a prefix.

DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces, separated by commas (e.g., 254114018035,254114148625).

CODE.description: Enter your country code without +. Example: 254 for Kenya. This allows the bot to detect and remove foreigners if commanded.

BOTNAME.description: Enter the name for your bot.

ANTILINK.description: Enter true if you want to activate antilink where the bot kicks all link senders in your group of false/leave blank to deactivate.

EVENTS.description: Choose whether to allow the bot to detect events in groups such as promote, demote, remove, and add. If set to true, the bot will send welcome/goodbye messages and signal when someone is promoted or demoted.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Enter your GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) to allow the bot to upload command files.

REPO_NAME.description: Enter the name of your GitHub repository.

BRANCH.description: Enter the branch name where command files will be uploaded. Default is 'main'.
